page.title: 14Franche Community Centre
page.content: Our{Community Centre}is in the middle of a council estate in Franche. It is a well used building with cloakrooms, toilets, a kitchen and a main hall. The{Community Centre}is used for activities such as Franche Boys' Football Club discos which take place every month. There is a playschool for children from the age of three until five which meets four mornings a week. The children have a bottle of milk and a biscuit or two. Kung Fu takes place every Wednesday evening, and there is also bingo which starts at 8 o'clock and finishes at half past nine. Parties for old age pensioners take place here at Christmas. {Franche {Community Centre}is very important to our area because it provides us with many activities.
